Data Fields
sys_taskattr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » System Devices

Task Attributes. More...

#include <sys.h>

Collaboration diagram for sys_taskattr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure contains the task attributes used with I_SYS_GETTASK.

Data Fields

u32 pid
 PID for the task.
 
u32 tid
 Task ID.
 
u64 timer
 Timer used for tracking task CPU usage.
 
u32 mem_loc
 location of data memory
 
u32 mem_size
 Size of data memory.
 
u32 malloc_loc
 malloc base + size
 
u32 stack_ptr
 location of stack pointer
 
u8 prio
 Task Priority.
 
u8 prio_ceiling
 Task priority ceiling.
 
u8 is_active
 Non-zero for an active task.
 
u8 is_thread
 Non-zero if not main process thread.
 
u8 is_enabled
 Non-zero if associated with running process.
 
char name [LINK_NAME_MAX]
 Name of the process associated with the task.
